participant_1.background:
I am average height, but my family is very tall.
I enjoyed a cup of chai tea after a long day of knitting.
i worry about money even though i m in high school.
I miss my mom's custom-made shoes.
i have a cat as a pet.

participant_2.background:
My favorite type of fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer.
i work for the navy.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.
My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it.
I am a Japanese billionaire who loves the wind in my hair.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey! How's it going?
Pretty good! Just finished a long day of knitting. What's up with you?
I'm doing well! Just got off work. I'm in the Navy.
Oh, cool! What do you do in the Navy?
I'm a pilot!
Wow! That's awesome! I bet that's a lot of fun.
It is! I love it. What do you do for fun?
I like to knit, read, and hang out with my cat.
That sounds fun! I love to read too. My favorite type of fruit is watermelon.
Watermelon is delicious! It's so refreshing in the summer.
I know, right? I could eat it all day long.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but I especially love fantasy and historical fiction.
Me too! I love a good fantasy novel. I just finished reading a book about a princess who had to go on an adventure to save her kingdom.
That sounds like a great book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It was really good.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
No problem! I love to talk about books
